products.name: La Lagartija
products.description: Mysterious and treacherous... the best choice for the start of your journey! It will provide a rich delicious flavor.

products.name: El Tigre
products.description: Heavily dark coffee, only for the real gourmets. It has bitter flavor of grapefruit and is mixed with a little bit of peanuts with caramel.

products.name: La Cucaracha
products.description: Balanced and sweet blend, ideal for lazy Sunday mornings. A classic taste with a slight twist.
